label: Travel Accessories
description: Products and items used for travel purposes.
intents: Find products to make travel more comfortable.
Find products to organize and secure belongings while traveling.
Find products to adapt to different electrical outlets and plugs while traveling.

subcategories.description: Products used to organize and secure belongings while traveling.

subcategories.label: Comfort and Sleep
subcategories.description: Products used to make travel more comfortable and aid in sleep.

subcategories.description: Products used to adapt to different electrical outlets and plugs while traveling.

subcategories.label: Money and Document Holders
subcategories.description: Products used to hold money and travel documents.
